titleStmt.title: A brothers gift containing an hundred precepts, instructing all sorts of people to a godly, honest, and morall life.
titleStmt.author: Everinden, Humphrey.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by G. Eld] for Iohn Wright, and are to be sold at his hop at the signe of the Bible without Newgate,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
